Full-Stack Developer's Impact • Collaborate with game teams and platform engineers to build and maintain scalable tools, pipelines, and services that support live operations and game development workflows. • Contribute to the design and development of internal platforms that enhance developer productivity and system reliability. • Implement and improve logging, alerting, and observability tools to support diagnostics and live troubleshooting. • Participate in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, code reviews, and team retrospectives. • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code and scripts for cloud-native systems and backend services. • Investigate, triage, and resolve operational issues, helping to ensure performance, uptime, and scalability across game services.
